data.name: Last Shot
data.detailed_description:
Last Shot takes shooters back to their roots in a fast-paced arena-style multiplayer shooter game that will challenge even the most seasoned and skilled players. Set on a galactic combat game show known as Last Shot, the game drops you in the battle as one of several combatants contending to defend their home world from disaster. Choose your combatant to play as, utilize your abilities, customize your weapons, demonstrate your tactics, and hone your skills to try and gain an advantage over your opponents. Take turns attacking, defending, kicking, screaming, shooting, and fighting for your home world’s survival!

As you are banished to this deserted planet with no aim assist, this game won’t be holding your hand, instead leaving you to fend for yourself and rely on your own skill to avoid certain death. Go it alone or work together with friends in this intense and challenging arena shooter! And of course no game show would be complete without announcers commentating on all of the action- Last Shot is hosted by none other than Spectre-473 from Zeta-Reticuli and Skashkar, the Conqueror of Worlds, who will give you play-by-play commentary on all of the chaos and destruction!

Along with grindable challenges, dozens of customizable characters and weapons, thousands of attachments, abilities to master, and over 20 competitive game modes, Last Shot offers a variety of both symmetrical and asymmetrical maps, each with its own unique setting, tactical vantage points, and play style. Experience new worlds, gameplay, strategies, and more as Last Shot evolves over time. Shake up the rules of engagement with every update that includes a new theme, new combatants, weapons, abilities, game modes, and maps to learn and master. Continue to grow your skills alongside the ever-changing landscape with your friends and become the most experienced and dangerous competitor out there as you seek the throne of Skashkar.



Features:

* Fast-paced, highly competitive solo and team play that takes the shooter back to its purest arena-style roots.

* No aim assist, so you’ll have to practice if you want to build your skill.

* The ability to switch between first and third person in-game with the press of a button.

* The challenge to master an ever-expanding assortment of powerful weapons and equipment.

* A continuous roster of heroic combatants to play as, each with unique abilities to master.

* Themed seasons that will keep the game feeling fresh and keep the maps and setting new.

* The ability to change the art style of the game to suit you: using advanced technology, we give you a way to change how the game looks so you can enjoy the game in the artistic style of your choice.

* On-The-Fly weapon customization, allowing you to quickly change between skins and attachments you unlock in gameplay.

* A never-ending battle pass that adds more to unlock every season, corresponding to the season's themes. These can include skins for characters, weapons, attachments for weapons, and much more.



* Three distinct game modes:

* Arena – Welcome to a blast from the past in the purest form where skill is earned and you are only as good as your reflexes. Battle across several competitive arenas as you compete to protect your home world. Play solo or on a team in a variety of different game modes tailored to the true arena experience. There are no abilities here, only pure skill, and as you play you’ll get better at the game. Even without the edge of abilities, the battle will keep you on the edge of your seat! Game modes you can expect to play are Deathmatch, Assault, Bombing Run, Capture The Flag, King Of The Hill, and many more.

* Objective – Here you must not only be skillful but also utilize your character's abilities. The characters you play as can drastically alter the battle by using distinct abilities- from healing to force field shields to teleportation! You’ll want to learn each character and their abilities in order to gain the upper hand in objective-based gameplay. Battle through different games with a team as you capture, defend, and outlast your opponents, utilizing your individual skills and abilities to work together towards victory! Game modes you can expect to play are Payload, Escort, One Shot, as well as some of the game modes from Arena.

* Battle Royale – This is the culmination of Last Shot as you battle for it all! You must utilize all you have learned to duke it out - solo or on a team - in the last man standing war to conquer the planet and get the opportunity to battle the Conqueror of Worlds himself, Skashkar, to protect your own home world. Your enemies will be all around and, be warned, not all combatants are immediately visible to the eye. At times the very battlefield you play on can trick you and be an enemy itself!

Gameplay takes place in a large variety of arenas: from a desolate planet's foundry, to vast geometric landscapes, neon corridors, sprawling city streets, and many more. Each environment is set in a world that Skashkar has conquered and used for the purposes of hosting Last Shot.

data.short_description: Last Shot is a fast-paced arena-style shooter that combines the tactical experience of team play with the gladiatorial combat of skill-based shooters with cutting-edge technology and a fight for survival. Restore peace as you play as our combatants each with unique abilities for players to master.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: In this game you will encounter a variety of visual effects that may provide seizures or loss of consciousness in a minority of people. If you or someone you know experiences any of the above symptoms while playing, stop and seek medical attention immediately.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: In this game you will encounter a variety of visual effects that may provide seizures or loss of consciousness in a minority of people. If you or someone you know experiences any of the above symptoms while playing, stop and seek medical attention immediately.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
